pros: FH Canada has a great workplace culture, collaborative and fun. The organization truly lives out its stated values. The programs funded are impactful, and it's work you can truly believe in.
cons: As a smaller organization, workloads can sometimes be high and there's not a lot of opportunity for career advancement. But there is flexibility and compassion for staff, so that makes up for it.

review_title: Int' Development org with high proficiency and exemplary office culture
job_title: Marketing & Communications Director in Abbotsford, BC
pros:
Value their faith-base, relationships, results, efficiency
Ambitious and visionary
cons: Dreams can get ahead of their reality
